text: Richard Kristl (born November 14, 1995) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for SK Horácká Slavia Třebíč of the Czech 1.liga. Kristl made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Plzeň during the 2015-16 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:HC Plzeň players Category:SK Horácká Slavia Třebíč players Category:Czech ice hockey forwards
title: Richard Kristl
